下載並解壓 Google Drive 上的壓縮檔

  • wkentaro/gdown
{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

download_gdrive[source]

download_gdrive(url=None, file_id=None, file_name=None, data_folder=None, extract_all=False, **kwargs)

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
#server
url = "https://drive.google.com/uc?id=1IGrTr308mGAaCKotpkkm8wTKlWs9Jq-p"
file_name = "crypko_data.zip"
data_folder = "crypko"

file_path = download_gdrive(url=url, 
                            file_name=file_name, 
                            data_folder=data_folder)
file_path

#server
file_path, files = download_gdrive(url=url, 
                                   file_name=file_name, 
                                   data_folder=data_folder,
                                   extract_all=True)
assert type(files) == list and len(files) == 71315
files[:5]
